title: It's a picture of a serif font in a book
content:
Hi!  
I'm trying to find this font... is like an old fell font, but the J is different.  
I hope you can help me!  
Thanks
author: kariki

comments.content:
Your image didn’t post. Please check the posting guidelines and try again.

EDIT: I see it now. Plantin Light and Light Italic:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/plantin/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416011424/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/plantin/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/plantin/")
